repo-security-check.description: Critical security check before creating any GitHub repository
repo-security-check.trigger: before any 'gh repo create' or repository creation commands
repo-security-check.action: Read and follow security-repo-hook.md - NEVER delete files, always use .gitignore to exclude sensitive data including .env files, .md files, .bat/.sh scripts, debug/dev/test directories, and temporary files. Use 'git rm --cached' to remove from tracking without deleting.
